0.cdata!:
République centrafricaine - Projet sur
            les Dimensions Sociales de l'Ajustement et du Développement

theme: Administrative and civil service reform,Law reform,Gender,Social analysis and monitoring

abstracts.cdata!:
The outcome of the Social Dimensions of
            Adjustment and Development Project for the Central African
            Republic (CAR) was highly unsatisfactory. The project
            objectives were poorly constructed and made unclear. The
            World Bank did not support the accumulated policy
            information for which the following objectives were
            presented: (a) social policy and planning (b) women in
            development; and (c) teacher training. Failure to adapt
            project design to the country's limited human and
            institutional capacity, along with CAR political and civil
            instability made the project a failure.
